member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.ActionDescriptor
member.summary: Gets or sets Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription.ActionDescriptor for this api.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.GroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets group name for this api.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.HttpMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the supported HTTP method for this api, or null if all HTTP methods are supported.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.ParameterDescriptions
member.summary: Gets a list of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiParameterDescription for this api.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.Properties
member.summary: Gets arbitrary metadata properties associated with the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.RelativePath
member.summary: Gets or sets relative url path template (relative to application root) for this api.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.SupportedRequestFormats
member.summary: Gets the list of possible formats for a request. Will be empty if the action does not accept a parameter decorated with the [FromBody] attribute.

member.name: P:ServiceRegister.Options.ApiDescriptionOptions.SupportedResponseTypes
member.summary: Gets the list of possible formats for a response. Will be empty if the action returns no response, or if the response type is unclear. Use ProducesAttribute on an action method to specify a response type.
